tool_description: Generate custom QR codes for any data. See more info at https://api-ninjas.com/api/qrcode.
name: QR Code by API-Ninjas
title: QR Code by API-Ninjas

api_list.name: /v1/qrcode
api_list.description: API Ninjas QR Code API endpoint. Returns a QRCode image binary specified by input parameters.

required_parameters.name: data
required_parameters.description: data to encode in the QR code.

required_parameters.name: format
required_parameters.description: image format to return. Must be one of the following: png, jpg, jpeg, eps, svg.

optional_parameters.name: size
optional_parameters.description: size of the QR code image to generate. The output will be a square image with (size x size) dimensions.

optional_parameters.name: fg_color
optional_parameters.description: foreground color of the QR code. Must be a 6-digit hex color (e.g. 00ff00 for green). Default is 000000 (black)

optional_parameters.name: bg_color
optional_parameters.description: background color of the QR code. Must be a 6-digit hex color (e.g. 00ff00 for green). Default is ffffff (white)
